nodes.text: Durmat was a Human male who served as an Ensign with the Republic during the Cold War, and was the son of the Imperial spy Rylon.

In 3643 BBY, Durmat was held prisoner on Balmorra when his father was secretly helping the Empire. While in captivity, he impulsively confessed about his father's true allegiance. He later encountered Darth Baras' apprentice who was sent to kill him. Durmat begged the Sith Warrior to spare him since he was valuable to the Empire, but the Warrior refused his offer and killed him.

The Sith Warrior has either the option of killing Durmat (Dark Side) or giving him a drug that would completely wipe his memory (Light Side). After taking the drug, the Warrior could kill Durmat anyway (Dark Side) or let him live (Light Side).
